entity.name: Jayachandra
entity.description: I'm an Android developer based in Hyderabad, India, focused on creating privacy-centric tools. EchoNum is designed to enhance user control over app internet access, aiming to improve data privacy and battery efficiency.

projects.name: EchoNum
projects.description: EchoNum is an Android app that restricts internet access for selected apps to only when they are in the foreground. It uses VPN and accessibility services without root, increasing privacy, saving data, and preserving battery life.

plans.name: EchoNum Development Plan
plans.description: Development and testing of the application, UI enhancements, security audits, and marketing efforts.
